text: <@UG7S8J18D> Thank you for your help! I was able to get that up and working.
Hello! Can anyone help me with HubSpot’s data sync feature? I need to add this functionality to my development app to sync all contact records with my own database. How can I do this?
The data sync feature is closed source. If you want to synchronize with your database, you will have to build that against the standard API or with Imports.
<@U014A8JD9DH> with the imports we have 2 option import and sync. Can i make use of sync feature if so how to build that app?

The sync feature (Like Data -> Integrations) cannot be extended via Apps.

Your options:
• Make use of the import feature (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/imports>)
• Make use of the standard contacts / Companies endpoints
okay. Actually I want to sync data from HubSpot to external system only.

Thats not a sync, that's an export :slightly_smiling_face:
• You can use exports <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/exports#endpoint?spec=POST-/crm/v3/exports/export/async>
• You can use standard list endpoints of your desired objects

*Would anyone be interested in testing out a tool that a friend/client has been building?*  
You can instantly create enterprise-ready GraphQL API with Policy-Based Access Controls from any SQL database.
